---
Help: E2E - Wallet approval flow SDLC primary indent(Generated To Approved)
Suites: pg
Test
---
!** Configuration
!5 Add WH manager role in roles in mongoDB
!5 Enable wallet_approve_at_generated and view_wallet_settings in Nimbus
!5 Add the roleid in wallet configuration under client configuration
**!
!** Test Coverage
!5 1. Create a direct dispatched PRIMARY indent with WH manager for source and destination depot
!5 2. Go to destination depot - INBOUND and submit S/D/CD Qty+amount in UI
!5 3. Check Email notifications in WH manger, transporter and shipper, check Wallet status as "Generated"
!5 4. Verify Wallet amount in both Source WH manager and Destination WH manager
!5 5. Go to WH Manager of source depot and check wallet -> Approve Shortage and check status as "Accepted"
!5 6. Go to Transporter, raise dispute for Carton Damage -> Reject it in Destination WH Manager (check mail notification)
!5 7. Check status as "under review" for carton damage and approve in shipper - superadmin 
!5 8. Raise dispute in Transporter for Damage and approve it directly in shipper - superadmin
!5 9. Check status of S/D/CD is "Accepted"
!5 10. Move the status to "Settled"
**!
